title: Loan demand for rural homes, tractors may rise on govt push
description: "We believe a likely surge in rural credit demand, higher affordability and government push toward financial inclusion with ease of regulations in the microfinance sector. A likely credit-linked subsidy scheme (CLSS) in the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana would drive credit growth going forward," ICICI Securities said in a report.
